features: Genuine goat’s leather: soft and sturdy
3 heat settings: for even, gentle heat distribution
Ultra-light lithium-ion battery offering up to 10 hours of heat
Heat spreads 360° around the fingers and the top of the hand
Compatible pocket for two batteries, doubling the heating time
Soft mask wipe and nose wipe on the thumb: comfort
Security leash: so as not to lose the glove
Thin sleeves to better fit with jackets
